reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's cool, but.....
reviews.author: Samuel P.
reviews.content: This speaker works great and is very loud when on full volume. There seems to be a problem with the pitch of the music and sounds that play through as it seems to sound distorted when the speaker drops to a slightly lower pitch, then to a higher one. For the price, it's a surprising bug, and there are speakers for a fraction of the price without that problem. Another thing is, it is not meticulous on picking up minor details of some music. I do like the volume capabilities in terms of loudness and the speaker does it's intended job well.Video coming soon of problem mentioned.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was completely surprised at how great this sounds!
reviews.author: Victoria Berdon
reviews.content: I've been having trouble finding a reliable, decent-sounding bluetooth speaker for my laptop. A friend recommended this one. I was dubious due to its small size -- as my previous experience with speakers so small was that the sound was distorted and lacking in bass. Boy, was I surprised at how clear the sound is, and that it clearly has bass. I mostly listen to speaking voices and some music on my laptop and just wanted a step up in sound quality. I thought I might have to get bookshelf speakers, but no -- this little guy is more than doing the job! Amazed and impressed. Just don't expect audiophile sound -- it is what it is, but at this size, and price, it's fabulous!

Also it doesn't connect to sony music app.Only 100%, 70%, 50% and 10% battery percentage will be visible on PC or laptop.Connects perfectly to phone all time, no issues. content.product_name: Sony SRSXB13/B Extra Bass Portable Waterproof Speaker with Bluetooth, USB Type-C, 16 Hours Battery Life

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One Sony SRS-XB13 is superb. Two are moreso.
reviews.author: Jonathan
reviews.content: I bought two of these as a gift for a good friend, and we have tested them extensively on his screened-in back porch. We tested them both individually and also paired to play Pandora in stereo from a mid-tier Moto G Stylus smartphone. I have owned several excellent Sony audio products over many decades - from budget to ES level. The SRS-XB13 is a new favorite Sony product of mine. Flossy Carter on YouTube, one of my most reliable go-to reviewers, did a comparison of the Sony XB13 and its most direct competitor, the JBL Clip 4. Flossy included a side-by-side sound demo that I listened to with my Sennheiser HD 600 headphones. Flossy gave the edge to the Sony XB13. Now, having personally heard and tested them, I agree with Flossy Carter about how good the XB13 sounds, especially when paired in a stereo bluetooth link, which is easy to do, once you get the hang of it. Either way, solo or paired, you will get good, balanced high-fidelity sound with reasonably deep and even bass, clear midrange, and nice treble in a smooth and balanced, dynamic presentation with ample loudness. They do not sound cheap or tinny, at all. They sound really great with surprising richness and clarity at all volume levels. In single or stereo use a few feet away, we cannot carry on a normal conversation with the volume set anywhere over 50%. No, these will not replicate the gut-shaking, window-rattling volume of other more expensive and more powerful "party" speakers and boom boxes. These are just not meant for that. They are simply great for some semi-quiet to moderately loud or reasonably loud, nice quality music listening you can enjoy indoors or outdoors, perhaps on your back porch or patio while chilling out to your favorites - without having neighbors calling the police on you. I guarantee that you will find it very difficult to believe how truly good, rich, clear, dynamic, and balanced these little marvels from Sony sound, especially in a stereo pair. Aside from Siri and Google Assist and an IP67 water and dustproof rating, a big bonus is long battery life, I believe up to 16 hours at less than 50% volume and about 5 hours with volume over around 80%. They will very pleasantly surprise you and have you shaking your head in disbelief, especially when paired in stereo. I highly recommend one or two, especially while Sony is still making them, probably at a low profit margin.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 20, 2022

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow -- Update
reviews.author: Amazon Customer
reviews.content: Update: Just got my second one. Paired them, very ez, and OMG!!! Table Top Rock is here to stay! The sound is excellent. My ears are shot from years on stage standing in front amps turned to 11. And these sound really good to my ears. You can crank up the bass or tremble to suit your taste. They will do it. I run my mp3's through a compression algorithm so they are hot and the punch, the fullness is all there. I can't crank it up and rock the whole house but I can crank it up and rock my space.Unbelievable sound comes out of this little package. I already ordered another one, with 2 you can have a Left & Right or play together in party mode. I can't crank it up where I live but now I can table top rock, loud, with incredible sound. I like the size and feel, the fit & finish. I can feel the table top vibrating as I'm typing. It's great.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States February 24, 2024

reviews.author: Everret Berry
reviews.content: The media could not be loaded. I really enjoy this the low tier speaker I always usually want to keep a decent Bluetooth speaker around and this one has surprise me it's portable like I said it's so little you'll be surprised by the quality of sound and if you have a good equalizer it just makes it even better The best way to use it like I said is to give it some walls to for the sound to bounce off of and it makes the sound even better and if you get another one it can connect and go into stereo mode which is a pretty awesome feature because then it's even better and any dislikes The charger could be faster I think it takes up to about 4 hours or something like this just ridiculous but anyway the truly wonderful thing about it is that if you had a hundred they can all connect to each other imagine what you can do with that lol
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States December 23, 2023

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ugh so cute
reviews.author: Sandra Lynn
reviews.content: The bass and sound in this are incredible! I gave it a full charge and if it doesn’t stay charged long I’ll come back and update, but exactly what I was looking for for outside! Also I love the texture of it for some reason. lol! AZ heat is rough too so I will update if it breaks.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States May 17, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be better
reviews.author: Trish B.
reviews.content: The speaker is nice. Essentially pleasing. I would have loved for the sound to be more clear and have the bass. It literally can get loud and can be heard if it’s in another room from where you are. To give further context it’s kind of like you hear the words of a song but not the background words, melody or bass. I think it’s and okay speaker but it’s not great! Rating: 3/5
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States March 15, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best sound companaion
reviews.author: Umesh
reviews.content: Sony Wireless Speakers boast a sleek and modern design that seamlessly integrates into any environment. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, these speakers are not just auditory marvels but also aesthetic delights. The sound quality is crisp, clear, and immersive, providing a rich and dynamic listening experience. With advanced audio technologies such as Extra Bass and High-Resolution Audio support, these speakers excel in reproducing every nuance of your favorite tunes. Connectivity One of the standout features of Sony Wireless Speakers is their versatile connectivity options. Equipped with Bluetooth technology, NFC pairing, and even Wi-Fi compatibility in some models, connecting your devices to these speakers is a breeze.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States January 28, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars How well it work

reviews.content: It worked great.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dont think about it, just buy it
reviews.author: Steffen
reviews.content: At the size and quality, no one compares to what SONY has done with this line of small speakers. I am a faithful user for over 10 years of this specific SRS line, from the xb-10 now to the srs xb-100.I'm proud to show off and brag about my SONY portable speaker!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States May 27, 2024

reviews.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Look like a can. Sounds like one too.
reviews.author: Guy in Philly
reviews.content: So first of all just pairing this thing for the first time was unclear. It's two clicks on the Bluetooth button. Holding the button activates the stereo pairing with another speaker. Annoying and that brings me to the biggest problem with this. While other single speaker setups still manage to sound reasonably good, this one sounds like the monaural can it is and let's face it, needing two speakers to sound good kinda defeats the purpose of a highly portable speaker. Also, the sound profile is all highs and bass with no mid and while you can use a graphic equalizer to greatly improve the sound, it still sounds tinny, despite a lot of detail. You can get a better speaker for less.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States June 3, 2024

content.product_name: Sony SRSXB13/B Extra Bass Portable Waterproof Speaker with Bluetooth, USB Type-C, 16 Hours Battery Life
